response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,500,000 in your eyes. I understand its significance and would like to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to consider selling this product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This is a generous offer that reflects my desire to ensure it finds the right owner who appreciates its true worth. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1200000}
